metaDescription: BRISANAR Torrevieja: Modern 1-bed apartments from €185,000. CBM HOMES development in Playa del Acoqui. Delivery Dec 2026. Investment opportunity in Spain's largest expat community.

content.heroIntro:
Welcome to BRISANAR, an exciting new residential development by CBM HOMES located in the vibrant coastal area of Playa del Acoqui, Torrevieja. This contemporary project offers beautifully designed 1-bedroom apartments starting from just €185,000, making it an exceptional value proposition on the Costa Blanca. With delivery scheduled for December 2026, BRISANAR represents the perfect opportunity for buyers seeking affordable Mediterranean living combined with modern construction standards and quality finishes.

Torrevieja has established itself as Spain's premier expat destination, with over 40% of the population being international residents. The area's popularity stems from its outstanding infrastructure, including the Hospital Universitario de Torrevieja providing 24-hour public healthcare, pristine Blue Flag beaches, and world-class golf courses within minutes. BRISANAR sits at the heart of this thriving community, offering residents immediate access to shopping centers, international schools, restaurants, and entertainment venues.

This development embodies CBM HOMES' commitment to quality construction and customer satisfaction. Each apartment features contemporary finishes, efficient layouts, and thoughtful amenities designed for modern living. Whether you're seeking a holiday home, investment property with strong rental potential (€650+ per week), or permanent residence in Europe's most welcoming community, BRISANAR delivers exceptional value and lifestyle quality.

locationSection.intro: Playa del Acoqui is one of Torrevieja's most sought-after residential neighborhoods, positioned perfectly between the bustling town center and the serene beaches. This strategic location offers residents the best of both worlds: easy access to comprehensive urban amenities while maintaining peaceful suburban surroundings. The area is characterized by modern infrastructure, excellent transport connections, and a mature expat community where English is widely spoken. Playa del Acoqui attracts international buyers and renters seeking authentic Mediterranean living with all the comforts of home. The neighborhood boasts excellent schools, healthcare facilities, shopping centers, and direct access to some of Spain's finest beaches, making it ideal for families, retirees, and investors alike.

propertyFeatures.intro: BRISANAR apartments are constructed to the highest contemporary standards, featuring modern architectural design combined with practical functionality. CBM HOMES has carefully selected premium materials and finishes throughout each property, ensuring durability and aesthetic appeal. Every apartment is designed to maximize natural light and space efficiency, creating comfortable living environments. The development incorporates sustainable building practices and energy-efficient systems, reducing utility costs for residents while minimizing environmental impact. Quality construction is evident in every detail, from structural integrity to finishing touches.

content.investmentSection: BRISANAR represents an excellent investment opportunity in one of Spain's most dynamic property markets. Torrevieja has experienced consistent growth with property values appreciating 8% year-on-year, significantly outpacing national averages. The development's starting price of €185,000 sits approximately 45% below comparable properties on Costa Blanca North, offering outstanding value. The rental market is exceptionally strong, with similar apartments generating €650+ per week through short-term holiday lettings. Long-term rental yields remain competitive at 4-5% annually. The massive expat demographic ensures consistent demand from both buyer and renter perspectives. CBM HOMES' established reputation and the property's prime location near beaches and amenities position BRISANAR for strong capital appreciation and reliable income generation, making it an intelligent choice for portfolio diversification.

faqs.question: What is the price of properties in BRISANAR?
faqs.answer: BRISANAR starts from €185,000 for modern 1-bedroom apartments with 62 m² of built space. Only 2 units available. This exceptional pricing includes parking, storage, and access to communal facilities. Contact our team directly for current availability and specific pricing details.

faqs.question: When will BRISANAR be completed?
faqs.answer: BRISANAR is scheduled for delivery on 1st December 2026. CBM HOMES provides a 10-year structural warranty on all properties. We can discuss specific delivery schedules and payment plans tailored to your requirements.

faqs.question: Who is the developer of BRISANAR?
faqs.answer: CBM HOMES is the developer, a reputable construction company with an established track record building quality residential properties throughout Torrevieja and the surrounding Costa Blanca region. They are known for professional project management and customer satisfaction.

faqs.question: Is Torrevieja a good place to buy property?
faqs.answer: Absolutely. Torrevieja is Spain's largest expat community with over 40% international residents and English widely spoken everywhere. Property values show consistent 8% year-on-year appreciation. The area features excellent amenities including Hospital Universitario de Torrevieja (24-hour public healthcare), world-class golf courses, pristine beaches like Playa del Cura with Blue Flag status, international schools, and comprehensive shopping and dining options. It's ideal for retirement, family living, and investment.

faqs.question: How far is BRISANAR from the beach?
faqs.answer: BRISANAR is just 2 kilometers from Playa del Cura, a pristine Blue Flag award-winning beach. La Mata with its golden sands is 6 kilometers away. Additional beaches including Los Locos and Los Náufragos are all within easy driving or cycling distance. Beach access is a major lifestyle benefit of the location.

faqs.question: What amenities are near BRISANAR?
faqs.answer: Comprehensive amenities surround BRISANAR: Mercadona (multiple locations), Carrefour, and Lidl for shopping within 1-2 km; Hospital Universitario de Torrevieja (24-hour public healthcare) at 3 km; Villamartín Golf Club (15 minutes); El Limonar International School (British curriculum); Quirónsalud Torrevieja (private healthcare); numerous Spanish and international restaurants; and regular bus connections to Alicante, Murcia, and coastal towns.

content.conclusion: BRISANAR by CBM HOMES represents a compelling opportunity to acquire a quality property in Spain's most vibrant expat destination. With prices from €185,000, strong investment fundamentals, completion in December 2026, and exceptional lifestyle amenities, this development appeals to buyers seeking value, stability, and Mediterranean living. The combination of affordability, location excellence, and proven market growth makes BRISANAR an intelligent investment. Limited units are available. We encourage you to contact our team via WhatsApp to discuss your specific requirements, arrange viewings, or request additional information. Our multilingual team is ready to guide you through every step of the purchase process. Don't miss this opportunity—contact us today to secure your slice of Spanish coastal paradise.
